title: Integrating single-cell multi-omics data through self-supervised clustering
details: Y Zeng, J Chen, Z Pan, W Yu, Y Yang - Applied Soft Computing, 2024
abstract: Advances in single-cell sequencing techniques enable individual cells to be sequenced across multiple modalities simultaneously, such as transcriptomics, epigenomics, and proteomics. Integrating multi-omics single-cell data provides a …
